_todo_1: TODO: map what is mapped in ~/.karabiner.d/configuration/karabiner.xml.old when features are available.

profiles._comments_1: non_use_backslash: map the uk key on the left of '1' to backtick.
profiles._comments_2: caps_lock: change caps lock to control.

rules.description: Map Media keys (mute/vol-/vol+; shift: pause/prev/next; alt: ?/brightness-/brigthness+)
Open apps with hyper-<letter> - f:finder, r:dropbox, z:iTerm, v:VimR, w:obsidian, q:obsidian-tasks-doc, d:ideaIJ, c:pycharm, a:things, x:firefox, s:safari

to.shell_command: open 'obsidian://open?vault=work&file=tasks%2FTasks' # Open Tasks doc in obsidian

rules.description: Change caps_lock key to control. (Post escape key when pressed alone)

manipulators.description: Change Freestyle Pro Application key to command+control+option+shift.

profiles.name: Default profile
